title: New loot: Soulstealer Vayne and Hextech Ward

replies.body: well i got lucky and got hextech annie in my 3rd chest. so after that i started selling all my hextech gems for the chest and key and i know i got more than 10. also i main vayne. fml
That's why you don't spend rare commodities willy nilly. BL though </3
man must suck for you xD
damn, unlucky
RIP ;-;
You should've read the part of the post that more mythical (gemstone) skins were coming out!
They needed to find a way to punish Vayne mains...
$55 for 1 gemstone rip wallet {{item:3070}}
$100 for 1 gemstone rip my wallet omfg
If you could craft 1 would you craft Hextech Annie or Soulstealer Vayne?
{{champion:1}}
I am saving up for that ward skin, idc about either champ
{{champion:67}} for days
{{champion:1}} all the way xD
{{champion:1}}
Why only can buy 10 box 2 times in 1 day?

5 gemstones for a ward?!
You've got to be having a joke mate.
It may seem steep now, but keep in mind that there will be easier methods of getting gemstones in future.

If there will be easier methods of getting gemstones, why not state that instead of having people spend heaps on chests because they think this is the only way. Why just randomly post it in this post? I'm sure alot of mums and dads will find out their credit cards have been used and will not be happy

It could be worse, on my main I own all champions. and last 5 boxes have been champion tokens... I disenchanted them. Because what else can I do with them? Imagine if I brought 10 chests and 5 of them were champions... IMagine
aka another way to profit off of it? ;)

This should be also how you plan to re-release Championship Riven also, hell expensive or 10gemstones, either way... It makes a hard viable grind and keeps original owners happy... I for one don't care, i just know this is a heated debate at present and a good solution on keeping both sides happy. 

I'm in the same boat, i've disenchanted 5 gems not caring about annie, $55 seems steep, but to be honest... The company has put to many IP grinds available that it's profit line would be starting to suffer, i think it's fair. Keeps a rare thing rare, or extremely hard to get so it is appreciated.

Good job :)

Just a shame the rich jerks will pay $550 and say "got it on my 2nd chest free" or think it makes them special
soooo.. dont craft it then?
I'd pay max 2 gemstones

rekt
